import { MoreVert } from "@material-ui/icons" import "./post.css" import { Users } from "../../dummyData" import { useState } from 'react' function Post({ post }) { const [like, setLike] = useState(post.like) const [isLiked, setIsLiked] = useState(false) const likeHandler=()=>{ setLike(isLiked?like-1:like+1) setIsLiked(!isLiked) } return (
u.id === post.userId)[0].profilePicture} alt="" /> {Users.filter(u => u.id === post.userId)[0].username} {post.date}
{/* ? for some of the post dont have description */} {post?.desc} {/* post image */}
{like}
{post.comment} comments
) } export default Post
